features: DUAL HOT PLATES: NutriChef’s PKRTO28 is a multifunctional kitchen oven that comes with dual hot plates in large and small. Other than that, it has other versatile cooking styles such as bake on baking tray, grill with griddle, toast, turbo, rotisserie, broil and roast

CONTROL CONSOLE: Adjust time, temperature and functions with the oven cooker front panel rotary controls. The convenient cooking lamp and easy access glass door make cooking easier than ever. The 60-minute timer ensures ideal results every time

1400 WATT POWER: This kitchen convection oven has an energy efficient high power heating element at 1400 watts. The hot plate power is 1000 Watt (Large) and 600 Watt (Small). The maximum temperature setting is 450 °F

30 QUARTS CAPACITY: Cook for a lot of people with this toaster oven’s 30+ quarts capacity. Even though it can cook more, it is actually compact with an exact dimension of 19.6’’ x .16.0’’ x 13.5’’ that’s perfect for any kitchen countertop or tabletop

EASY TO CLEAN: The stain resistant housing, slide-out tray, and removable grill rack make the convection toaster oven roaster easy to clean after everyday use. It also has an easy to access glass door and weighs 28 lbs
Auto Shutoff after 60 minutes for Safety
body.description: NutriChef Model : PKRTO28Multifunction Kitchen Oven30L Multifunction Kitchen Oven, Countertop Rotisserie Cooker with Dual Hot PlatesFeatures:Simple Food Prep with Tasty ResultsMulti-Function Kitchen Oven CookerDual Top Panel Hot Plates, Large & SmallRotisserie Mode Perfect for Roasting MeatsAbility to Cook, Bake, Grill, Broil, Roast & ToastEnergy Efficient Design: Save Time & Cook Quickly Time & Temperature Setting AdjustmentEasy Access Glass Door Convenient Cooking Lamp LightHigh-Powered Heating ElementFront Panel Rotary ControlsPerfect for Any Kitchen Counter or TabletopEasy-to-Clean & Stain-Resistant Housing What’s in the Box:Multifunction Countertop Oven Wire Grill RackBaking TrayRotisserie SkewerTray Handles Technical Specs:Oven Cooker Heating Element Power: 1500 WattHot Plate Power: 900 Watt (Large), 500 Watt (Small)Housing Material: Metal Steel Alloy*Oven & Hot Plates Cannot be Used SimultaneouslyMaximum Time Setting: 60 MinutesMaximum Temperature Setting: 450 °FahrenheitFood Capacity: 30+ QuartsPower Cord Length: 3.2’ ft.Power: 110VTotal Unit Dimensions (L x W x H): 19.6’’ x 16.0’’ x 13.5’’ -inchesThe NutriChef 30L Multifunction Kitchen Oven, Countertop Rotisserie Cooker with Dual Hot Plates - Simple Food Prep with Tasty Results - Multi-Function Kitchen Oven Cooker - Dual Top Panel Hot Plates, Large & Small - Rotisserie Mode Perfect for Roasting Meats - Ability to Cook, Bake, Grill, Broil, Roast & Toast - Energy Efficient Design: Save Time & Cook Quickly - Time & Temperature Setting Adjustment - Easy Access Glass Door - Convenient Cooking Lamp Light - High-Powered Heating Element - Front Panel Rotary Controls - Perfect for Any Kitchen Counter or Tabletop - Easy-to-Clean & Stain-Resistant Housing - What’s in the Box: - Multifunction Countertop Oven - Wire Grill Rack.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Easy to Use, for a Crowd or Just You Multiple Rack Position Place food right under the broiler or make room for large items. High and low oven rack positions provide the versatility to have great results for all foods. Energy Efficient Oven helps save energy when preparing small meals because you don’t have to heat it so it eliminates the need to heat unnecessary space…now that’s smart cooking! Convection Heating Get faster times and more even cooking with the specially engineered convection heating that circulates heat throughout the toaster oven for maximum efficiency.

Key Features: Convection technology for fast and even heating Oven features digital settings for pizza, bake, broil, toast, and defrost60-minute timer ensures ideal results every timeEasy-clean interior Your Personal Sous Chef Delicious Ideas for Your Countertop Oven Using a toaster oven instead of a full-sized oven for smaller jobs avoids heating up your house and wasting energy. Countertop ovens preheat very quickly too, which saves time in the kitchen! Countertop ovens are much safer for kids to use than a large oven, allowing them to gain cooking independence. It makes a great alternative to your conventional oven for keeping the kitchen cooler and conserving energy; or use it as an additional oven for holidays or entertaining. 30 Quarts Capacity 1400 Watt Power Control Console Dual Hot Plates

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Loved especially when we didn't have a working oven or stove. It came in handy and is still.very useful. I love it. And my husband does to. My daughter likes to help cook she she puts cookies or biscuits in the oven.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It saves putting on the big oven when only cooking for 2

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2021
reviews.reviewText: It is terrible .The knobs to use it is like a secret code that the instructions you can't even understand the burners take forever to get hot or boil water forget it if you want to boil more the a cup and a half. You can't even use burners and oven at the same time. Have to put both burners on to get even hot. Then you can't use the top rack to broil anything because of the rotisserie. Component. I had a toaster oven I bought at a second hand store for five dollars that worked better then this oven I had for five years I gave away because my daughter said get another one and when I seen this one with the burners I thought this would be great I should of sent it back but I stupidity thrown the box out. I wouldn't pay $2.00 for this if I ever seen it in a store rather then a second hand store. Just skip it don't even purchase it. I would give it 10 minus stars if I rated it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The best feature is also it's weakness, running on 110 volts and will not trip the circuit breaker, it's a tad slow /underpowered but I got used to it real fast.The timer setting is ultra useful, no more worries about forgetting to turn offI highly recommend this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I have used many of these types of oven over the years and the best feature for this one is the top burners. Very convenient for use in my RV. Even though you can't used both the oven and the burners (way too many watts required for that) you can start the oven and let it warm up, then switch to the burners, cook whatever and use the oven as a warmer, especially on cooler days at camp. Other features I like is the ability to only use the upper or lower elements for cooking. Sometimes I just want to broil. I bought an aluminum grill top for use on the burners. This turns it into a grill also. What I don't like is more of a design flaw. The rotisserie connections inside the oven are in the way of the groove for the top most rack. I have to shove the rack in if I want to broil something close to the elements. Overall, although this oven is not as large as my other ones, it is perfect for my RV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Burners aren't very powerful
reviews.reviewText: Love the oven and the compactness of it! The controls are kind of confusing, but you get over it after awhile of use. But, I bought this one over a single oven because of the stovetop burners! It shows in the knobs you can adjust them to 750° however, that's the only temp we ever put it on because it barely gets anything to a sizzle! It takes a long time to get hot (warm) so making anything on it takes awhile!!!I would have just bought a larger toaster oven and an electric skillet. Which I ended up buying anything way!Great concept, poor follow through.

Very good product the product works great the food tastes great
